readme:
_Tags: Automation, Finance, Google Sheets, API_

_Note: This workflow uses the Exchange rate API and requires a valid API key._

### Context

I’m a **Supply Chain Data Scientist** who builds automations to streamline operations, reduce manual tasks, and boost decision-making through real-time data.

In this workflow, I automated the task of **fetching live currency exchange rates** , updating a **Google Sheet** with the latest values, and **archiving historical records** — all without writing any code.

> Improve your productivity by automating admin tasks with n8n!

📬 For business inquiries, you can add me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

### Who is this template for?

This template is perfect for:

  * **Finance teams** tracking multi-currency cashflows
  * **Analysts** building dashboards or models requiring updated FX data
  * **Anyone working with spreadsheets** who needs up-to-date exchange rates



It updates:

  * A live sheet with the latest USD-based exchange rates
  * An archive tab to track historical changes over time



![Exchange Rate Workflow](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/04/image-4.png)

### How does it work?

This workflow runs in N8N and performs the following steps:

  1. 🌐 **Calls the ExchangeRate API** to get the latest rates based on USD
  2. 🧠 **Extracts and formats key fields** : base currency, timestamp, and conversion values
  3. 📊 **Updates a main Google Sheet** with the latest data (using upsert logic)
  4. 🗂️ **Appends all rates** to a second Google Sheet tab for historical tracking



You can schedule this workflow to run daily, hourly, or on-demand.

### What do I need to start?

You don’t need to write a single line of code.

#### Prerequisites:

  * A **Google Sheet** with two tabs: `Rate Sheet` and `Archives` _(Link of the publicly available example in the template)_
  * A **valid Exchangerate API key**
  * **Google Sheets API** connected via OAuth2



### Next Steps

Use the sticky notes in the workflow to understand how to:

  * Add your Exchangerate API key
  * Map the fields to match your Google Sheet layout
  * Schedule the run frequency using the **Cron node**
  * Optionally add Slack or email alerts if the base rate changes



For more information, check my tutorial:

![Tutorial YouTube](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/04/temp-6.png)  
[🎥 Watch My Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lhi6hV6rWEo)

🚀 Want to build finance automation workflows like this?  
📬 Let’s connect on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

### Notes

  * You can adapt this template for **other currencies** by changing the API endpoint



_This workflow was built using**n8n 1.85.4**  
Submitted: April 15th, 2025_

Tags: Automation, Finance, Google Sheets, API

Note: This workflow uses the Exchange rate API and requires a valid API key.

Context

I’m a Supply Chain Data Scientist who builds automations to streamline operations, reduce manual tasks, and boost decision-making through real-time data.

In this workflow, I automated the task of fetching live currency exchange rates, updating a Google Sheet with the latest values, and archiving historical records — all without writing any code.

Improve your productivity by automating admin tasks with n8n!

📬 For business inquiries, you can add me on LinkedIn

Who is this template for?

This template is perfect for:

  • Finance teams tracking multi-currency cashflows
  • Analysts building dashboards or models requiring updated FX data
  • Anyone working with spreadsheets who needs up-to-date exchange rates

It updates:

  • A live sheet with the latest USD-based exchange rates
  • An archive tab to track historical changes over time

How does it work?

This workflow runs in N8N and performs the following steps:

  1. 🌐 Calls the ExchangeRate API to get the latest rates based on USD
  2. 🧠 Extracts and formats key fields: base currency, timestamp, and conversion values
  3. 📊 Updates a main Google Sheet with the latest data (using upsert logic)
  4. 🗂️ Appends all rates to a second Google Sheet tab for historical tracking

You can schedule this workflow to run daily, hourly, or on-demand.

What do I need to start?

You don’t need to write a single line of code.

Prerequisites:

  • A Google Sheet with two tabs: Rate Sheet and Archives (Link of the publicly available example in the template)
  • A valid Exchangerate API key
  • Google Sheets API connected via OAuth2

Next Steps

readme_zh:
_标签：自动化，财务，谷歌表格，API_

_注意：此工作流使用汇率API，需有效的API密钥。_

### 背景  

我是一名**供应链数据科学家**，致力于通过自动化优化运营、减少人工操作，并借助实时数据提升决策效率。  

在此工作流中，我实现了**实时获取货币汇率**、用最新数据更新**谷歌表格**以及**归档历史记录**的全自动化——全程无需编写代码。  

> 用n8n自动化行政任务，提升你的工作效率！  

📬 商务合作请通过[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)联系我  

### 适用人群  

本模板非常适合：  
* **财务团队**追踪多币种资金流  
* **分析师**构建需要实时外汇数据的仪表盘或模型  
* **任何使用电子表格**且需获取最新汇率的人员  

功能包括：  
* 实时更新以美元为基准的汇率主表  
* 历史汇率归档表用于长期趋势跟踪  

![汇率工作流图示](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/04/image-4.png)  

### 工作原理  

该工作流在N8N中运行，执行以下步骤：  
1. 🌐 **调用ExchangeRate API**获取基于美元的最新汇率  
2. � **提取并格式化关键字段**：基准货币、时间戳、换算值  
3. 📊 **更新谷歌主表格**（采用upsert逻辑）  
4. 🗂️ **将所有汇率追加**到归档表格实现历史追踪  

可设置为每日、每小时或按需运行。  

### 准备工作  

无需编写任何代码。  

#### 前提条件：  
* 含`汇率表`和`归档表`的**谷歌表格**（模板中提供公开示例链接）  
* **有效的Exchangerate API密钥**  
* 通过OAuth2连接的**谷歌表格API**  

### 后续步骤  

参照工作流中的便签说明：  
* 添加Exchangerate API密钥  
* 调整字段映射以匹配你的表格布局  
* 使用**Cron节点**设置运行频率  
* 可选：当基准汇率变动时添加Slack或邮件提醒  

详细教程请见：  
![教程视频封面](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/04/temp-6.png)  
[🎥 观看教程视频](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lhi6hV6rWEo)  

🚀 想构建类似的财务自动化工作流？  
📬 欢迎通过[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)联系  

### 注意事项  
* 修改API端点即可适配**其他货币**  

_本工作流基于**n8n 1.85.4**构建  
提交日期：2025年4月15日_

    {
      "id": "7e27ded4-f201-4c45-9221-23a4dbdaada1",
      "name": "Sticky Note4",
      "type": "n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote",
      "position": [
        740,
        -280
      ],
      "parameters": {
        "color": 7,
        "width": 540,
        "height": 680,
        "content": "### 2. 更新汇率与记录数据\n结果将记录在两个工作表中：\n- 包含汇率和更新日期的发票模板工作表\n- 记录所有从基础货币到目标货币转换的记录工作表\n\n#### 如何设置？\n- **在Google表格中更新结果**：\n 0. 复制并粘贴Google表格模板：[模板表格](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SjzMb2q-6-byx9qmHbkrLseBWj9jEGduinH_5xi-c7g/edit?usp=sharing)\n   1. 添加您的Google Sheet API凭证以访问Google表格文件\n   2. 通过列表、URL或ID选择文件\n   3. 选择存储词汇列表的工作表\n [了解更多关于Google Sheet节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)"
      },
      "typeVersion": 1
    },
    {
      "id": "062fc991-7c1d-4aee-a85a-7b961e310c33",
      "name": "Format Output to JSON",
      "type": "n8n-nodes-base.code",
      "position": [
        580,
        280
      ],
      "parameters": {
        "jsCode": "const rates = items[0].json.conversion_rates;\n\nreturn [\n  {\n    json: rates\n  }\n];\n"
      },
      "typeVersion": 2
    },
    {
      "id": "2379c1ca-2348-4d19-b47e-8cbe5955e759",
      "name": "Sticky Note",
      "type": "n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote",
      "position": [
        20,
        -280
      ],
      "parameters": {
        "color": 7,
        "width": 480,
        "height": 640,
        "content": "### 1. 设置触发器和汇率API调用  \n计划任务将在每天上午08:00触发工作流。首先通过API调用获取美元对所有货币的汇率。  \n\n#### 如何设置？  \n- **填入你的汇率API密钥**：  \n  1. 注册免费账户并获取API密钥：[API文档](https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/overview)  \n  2. 将HTTP请求节点中的占位符`<YOUR_API_KEY>`替换为你的密钥"
      },
      "typeVersion": 1
    },
